parts.text: {"word":"deprimir","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人を)憂鬱にさせる、落ち込ませる、意気消沈させる","english_definition":"to depress, to make someone feel sad or discouraged","examples":[{"sentence":"La lluvia me deprime.","translation":"雨は私を憂鬱にさせる。"},{"sentence":"Las malas noticias lo deprimieron.","translation":"悪い知らせは彼を落ち込ませた。"}],"collocations":["deprimir a alguien (人を落ち込ませる)","deprimir el ánimo (気分を落ち込ませる)"],"synonyms":["entristecer","abatir","desanimar"],"antonyms":["animar","alentar","consolar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(経済・市場などを)不況にする、停滞させる","english_definition":"":"to depress (an economy, market, etc.), to cause to slow down or stagnate","examples":[{"sentence":"La crisis económica deprimió el mercado inmobiliario.","translation":"経済危機は不動産市場を不況にした。"}],"collocations":["deprimir el mercado (市場を不況にする)","deprimir la economía (経済を不況にする)"],"synonyms":["estancar","paralizar"],"antonyms":["activar","estimular"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vr","definition":"(人が)憂鬱になる、落ち込む、意気消沈する","english_definition":"to become depressed, to feel sad or discouraged","examples":[{"sentence":"Me deprimo cuando llueve.","translation":"雨が降ると憂鬱になる。"},{"sentence":"Se deprimió después de perder su trabajo.","translation":"彼は仕事を失った後、落ち込んだ。"}],"collocations":["deprimirse por algo (～のことで落ち込む)","deprimirse con facilidad (簡単に落ち込む)"],"synonyms":["entristecerse","abatirse","desanimarse"],"antonyms":["animarse","alentarse","consolarse"]}],"etymology":{"value":"From Latin deprimere, from de- (down) + premere (to press).","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/depɾiˈmiɾ/","syllables":"de-pri-mir"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["deprimo","deprimes","deprime","deprimimos","deprimís","deprimen"],"past_simple":["deprimí","deprimiste","deprimió","deprimimos","deprimisteis","deprimieron"],"future_simple":["deprimiré","deprimirás","deprimirá","deprimiremos","deprimiréis","deprimirán"],"present_subjunctive":["deprima","deprimas","deprima","deprimamos","deprimáis","depriman"],"past_subjunctive":["deprimiera","deprimieras","deprimiera","deprimiéramos","deprimierais","deprimieran"],"imperative":["(tú) deprime","(usted) deprima","(nosotros) deprimamos","(vosotros) deprimid","(ustedes) depriman"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Deprimir' is a verb that can be used both transitively (to depress someone or something) and reflexively (to become depressed). It is commonly used to describe feelings of sadness or discouragement, or the stagnation of an economy.","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Estoy deprimido con la lluvia.","correct":"Me deprimo con la lluvia.","note":"When referring to oneself becoming depressed, use the reflexive form 'deprimirse' (me deprimo, te deprimes, etc.)."},{"incorrect":"La película es deprimente. Estoy deprimido.","correct":"La película es deprimente. Estoy deprimido.","note":"'Deprimente' is an adjective meaning 'depressing', while 'deprimido' is an adjective meaning 'depressed'. The first sentence is correct."}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["depresión (depression)","deprimido (depressed)","deprimente (depressing)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"Relatively common","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"The verb 'deprimir' is used to express the action of making someone or something depressed, or the state of becoming depressed. It's important to understand the reflexive form ('deprimirse') to properly express the feeling of becoming depressed oneself. The related words 'depresión', 'deprimido', and 'deprimente' are also useful to know for a comprehensive understanding of the concept."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Esas noticias deprimen a cualquiera.","translation":"That news depresses anyone.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"to depress someone"},{"sentence":"El invierno siempre me deprime un poco.","translation":"Winter always depresses me a little.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"to depress someone"},{"sentence":"No te deprimas por eso, ya verás como todo se soluciona.","translation":"Don't get depressed about that, you'll see everything will work out.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"to become depressed"},{"sentence":"La falta de inversión deprimió la economía local.","translation":"The lack of investment depressed the local economy.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"to depress the economy"}]}
